name: Pesto Crispy Chicken
description: If you love herbaceous greens, you probably already have Pesto Sauce or Paris Bistro Sauce on your weekly meal prep to-do list. Make sure to double it up the week you plan on making this recipe.  It’s incredibly simple to make, but with restaurant quality flavour.

ingredients.name: SPG Seasoning or Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
prepared Pesto Sauce or Paris Bistro Sauce

preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Gently pound chicken between sheets of plastic wrap to even thickness.
Combine mix with seasoning, salt, and pepper until well-combined, and place crumb mixture on a plate.
Rub each chicken breast with 1–2 tbsp prepared sauce, and press in the crumbs to thoroughly coat. Arrange chicken on pan and bake, approximately 20 minutes turning once, or until chicken is cooked.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup mashed potatoes and 1 cup steamed veggies.
